item.description:
Hello, I'm Candace, I've met some of you and look forward to meeting more of you. I had such a wonderful time seeing the movie, "Julie and Julia" (Julia Child) with the group and thought it might be fun to have a Julia Child Cooking Class.

I have reserved a kitchen/club house facility in Bedford, MA. (near Lexington) We will prepare a full course dinner including appetizer and dessert and wine from Julia's cookbook. Our main course will be the famous, Beef Bourguignon (her signature dish).

Simply send $15 to the PAYPAL link no later than October 1. All of the food/groceries for the meal will be here when you arrive. French wine will be provided, also.

Join us for a fun afternoon, learning to cook the French way, and enjoying a full course French dinner.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Sunday Cooking with Julia
